thread.title: Create your own Custom Flashable Zips using the ‘Android Flashable Zip Creator’
thread.title_full: Create your own Custom Flashable Zips using the ‘Android Flashable Zip Creator’

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Create your own Custom Flashable Zips using the ‘Android Flashable Zip Creator’
text: A new tool for Windows and Linux users made by XDA Senior Member Nikhil allows you to create your own flashable zip files. This is useful for anyone installing many separate mods so you won’t have to remember to flash a ton of zips every time you want to update your ROM.
